name: Dead & in Love
description:
"oh no, you died." BUT you still have time to get back to your body and save yourself. there is only one thing. you gotta outrun Death. mwahahaha

Theme: "Death is only the beginning" 

Controls:

Move : WASD or Arrow Keys

Jump : Space

Posses : E

Move Items : Drag with Mouse

Activate Items : Q

Switch Items : TAB

Tip: You can put items in 4 side of the screen.

Our Team:

  • Dev: Hossein , Fazel , Mahdi
  • Design: Matin
  • Art: Maryam

Source: https://github.com/mmkhajoo/GameDev.tv-GameJam/
